game.name: DCS: A-10C Operation Agile Spear Campaign
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원
game.shortDescription: In a surprise move, Russia has, again, invaded Georgia and the United Nations is unable or unwilling to provide even the most basic military response to this attack. Initially, only the United States commits a small but highly effective force of A-10C Warthogs to help defend its Black Sea ally.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In a surprise move, Russia has, again, invaded Georgia and the United Nations is unable or unwilling to provide even the most basic military response to this attack. Initially, only the United States commits a small but highly effective force of A-10C Warthogs to help defend its Black Sea ally.
game.developers: Eagle Dynamics SA, Combat King Simulations
